title: Sour Homebrew returns bike production to Germany, debuts all-new Big Fun steel enduro hardtail
content:
Sour Bicycles is bringing steel bike production back home to Germany, transitioning all of their mountain bike frame building back from Asia starting in the new year. And to take advantage of the new capabilities and flexibility of their in-house manufacturing, Sour has just launched an all-new Big Fun enduro hardtail that you can pre-order

The post Sour Homebrew returns bike production to Germany, debuts all-new Big Fun steel enduro hardtail appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
